sermons.title: Murmuring Against One Another
sermons.description: Alan Martin shares from a deep burden of seeing brothers yield to murmuring against one another.  This is such a plague in the body of Christ. It is unsettling to see so many lifes shipwrecked by carnal and critical words. Where is the fear of God like David had, where we pray "Lord put a watch over my mouth, and keep the door of my lips."  May the fear of the Lord come upon us all.
